categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Emilia Clarke, full name Emilia Isabelle Euphemia Rose Clarke, (born October 23, 1986) is an English actress. She played the character Qi'ra in the movie Solo: A Star Wars Story, which is part of the Star Wars Anthology Series. Her role in the film has been stated to "round out a dynamic cast of characters that Han Solo and Chewbacca will encounter on their adventures."

Clarke rose to fame in 2011 for her breakthrough role as Daenerys Targaryen in the HBO series Game of Thrones. She is also known for her starring roles as Sarah Connor in the 2015 science fiction film Terminator Genisys and as Louisa Clark in the 2016 romantic drama film Me Before You.
